mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SD WHERE SD_CPCODE= #{cpcode}, SD_PRCODE= #{prcode}, SD_PSCODE= #{pscode}, SD_SCCODE= #{SCCODE}, SD_USERID= #{userid}, SD_CODE= #{sdcode}
SELECT * FROM WD WHERE WD_CPCODE= #{cpcode}, WD_PRCODE= #{prcode}, WD_USERID= #{userid}, WD_CODE= #{wdcode}, WD_TITLE= #{wdtitle}, WD_CONTENTS= #{wdcontents}, WD_DATE= #{wddate}
